DescriptionData.Title: Half Ass Design Stencils HAS5003
DescriptionData.Description: Half Ass Stencils are smaller versions of full size bad ass stencils that provide design options at a better value. Each set includes a range of 11 designs perfect for a variety of face paint design details.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Thin, flexible Mylar stencils perfect for face and body painting
Work great to create intricate face paint details with a brush, sponge or airbrush

3.3" x 2" Stencils in 11 designs: HAS4035 (Swirly Hearts), HAS3007 (Lattice), HAS3008 (Prismatic), HAS4035 (Lace Flowers), HAS3024 (Retro Circles), HAS3021 (Hexagonal), HAS3018 (Angled Retro), HAS3028 (Swirly), HAS3010 (Frozen Flowers), HAS4027 (Squares) and HAS4028 (Data Stream)
Can be easily stored in color coded chain (included).
